main

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Game

  • class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game class This class allows you to start the game, move pacman and ghosts. This class also manages scores and game levels.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Benoît Martel, Yoann Le Dréan
